name: Vase (vase à chaîne or vase à côte de melon)
maker: Design attributed to Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder, Modeled by Michel-Dorothée Coudray, and possibly Roger the Elder, et al
description: Vase (vase à chaîne or vase à côte de melon); Design attributed to Jean-Claude Duplessis the Elder (French, about 1695 - 1774), Modeled by Michel-Dorothée Coudray (French, 1718 - 1775), and possibly Roger the Elder (French, active 1754 - 1784), et al; Sèvres, France; about 1765 - 1770; Soft paste porcelain, blue ground color, and gilding; 45.1 × 21.9 cm (17 3/4 × 8 5/8 in.); 90.DE.113; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Vase (vase à chaîne or vase à côte de melon)
medium: Soft paste porcelain, blue ground color, and gilding
